view.wishlist

Class WishlistAddGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.wishlist.WishlistAddGUI

  • public class WishlistAddGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI class relating to the wishlist add section

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField additional
      Text field for additional information about the item to be added
      (package private) WishlistController controller
      Reference to the used WishlistController
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.DatePicker date
      Date picker for the date the item to be added is needed
      (package private) InputCheck inputCheck
      The input check class used for validating user input
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField item
      Text field for the name of the item to be added
      (package private) PersonDAO personDAO
      PersonDAO used for accessing the database
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.TextField price
      Text field for the price of the item to be added
      (package private) javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> toWhom
      ComboBox for selecting the person who the item to be added is for
      (package private) javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane wishlistaddpane
      The anchor pane for the add view

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WishlistAddGUI() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewItem()
      Method for adding a new item to the database Checks if the user inputs are valid, then calls the controller to create the new item If the user inputs are not valid, displays an error message to the user After the new item is created, returns to the main wishlist view
      void cancelAdd()
      Method for canceling the adding of a new item Exits the add view and returns to the main view
      java.lang.String getItemAdditional()
      Method for getting the value of the addition info text field
      java.sql.Date getItemDate()
      Method for getting the date when the item is needed from the date picker
      java.lang.String getItemDesc()
      Method for getting the value of the item text field
      java.lang.String getItemPerson()
      Method for getting the person who the item is for from the combo box
      java.lang.String getItemPrice()
      Method for getting the value of the price text field
      void initialize()
      Initialize-method called when the class is created Fetches the list of people in the database to whom items can be given Also possible to add a new Person in the drop down list in ComboBox - PersonDAO creates a new Person with the given name

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
